sqlMap.update: update tbTask set intTaskState = 0 where intTaskState = 1
sqlMap.select: select top 1 intFtbOid,vcTableName,dtLoadedTime from tbFactTableOperation where chIndexComplete = '1' and chTaskCreated = '0' order by dtLoadedTime

select intFtbOid,vcTableName,dtLoadedTime from tbFactTableOperation where chIndexComplete = '1' and chTaskCreated = '0' and (UPPER(vctablename) in ('FTBASSISTRULEDATA','FTBMAINRULEFLUSHDATA','FTBASSISTVETORRECOGNISEDATA') or vctablename like '%ftbGnSignalData%') order by dtLoadedTime desc
select count(1) from tbFactTableOperation where 1=1 and chTaskCreated in ('3','4')
select intFtbOid,vcTableName,dtLoadedTime from tbFactTableOperation where chIndexComplete = '1' and chTaskCreated = '2' order by dtLoadedTime asc
sqlMap.update: update tbFactTableOperation set chtaskcreated = #chTaskCreated# where vcTableName = #vcTableName# -- and (select count(1) from $vcTableName$ )>0
update tbFactTableOperation set chtaskcreated = #setChtaskcreated# where chtaskcreated = #whereChtaskcreated#
update tbFactTableOperation set chtaskcreated = '0' where chtaskcreated in ('3','4')
update tbFactTableOperation set chtaskcreated = '0' where chtaskcreated = '3'
update tbFactTableOperation set chtaskcreated = '2' where chtaskcreated = '4'
sqlMap.statement:
if exists ( select 1 from sys.systable where table_name = '$hourTempUserTableName$' and table_type in ('BASE', 'GBL TEMP') ) then drop table $hourTempUserTableName$ end if;
create table $hourTempUserTableName$ ( nmId NUMERIC(10) not null default autoincrement, intRaitype int null, intBscId int null, intStreetId int null, intProtocolTypeId int null, intWapId int null, intDescSgsnId int null, intBranchId int null, intSaleAreaId int null, intApnTypeId int null, intApnId int null, intUserBelongId int null, nmBussinessId numeric(6,0) null, nmBussinessTypeId numeric(3,0) null, nmImsi numeric(20) null, nmMsisdn numeric(20) null, intAppSuccessful int null, intAppUpFlush numeric(15,0) null, intAppDownFlush numeric(15,0) null, intYear int null, intMonth int null, intDay int null, intWeek int null, intHour int null, nmAreaId numeric(10,0) null, nmTerminalId numeric(5,0) null, ProductDimens numeric(20,0) null, constraint PK_FTBGNAPPDATA primary key (nmId) );
sqlMap.insert:
insert into tbTask (intTaskInfoId,vcTaskName,dtStatTime,chGranularity,intTaskPriority,intTaskState,dtCompleteTime,vcFactTableName,intFtbOid) select t.intTaskInfoId,t.vcTaskName,f.dtLoadedTime,t.chGranularity,t.intTaskPriority,0,null, case when UPPER(substr(f.vcTableName,0,length('ftbGnAppData')))!=UPPER('ftbGnAppData') then f.vcTableName when UPPER(substr(f.vcTableName,0,length('ftbGnAppData')))=UPPER('ftbGnAppData') and ( vcTaskName like '%彩信%' or vcTaskName like '%CMNET数据文件%' or vcTaskName like '%宏观呈现%' or vcTaskName like '%高交%' or vcTaskName like '%全部%' or vcTaskName like '%TOP100小区%' ) then f.vcTableName else string('temp_',f.vcTableName) end as factTableName,f.intFtbOid from tbFactTableOperation f,tbTaskInfo t where f.intFtbOid = #intFtbOid# and UPPER(t.vcFactTableName) = UPPER(substr(f.vcTableName,0,length(t.vcFactTableName))) and f.chIndexComplete = '1' and isnull(f.chTaskCreated,'2') = '2' and t.chFlag = '0' and t.chGranularity = '0' union select t.intTaskInfoId,t.vcTaskName,f.dtloadedtime,t.chGranularity,t.intTaskPriority,0,null,f.vcTableName,f.intFtbOid from tbFactTableOperation f,tbTaskInfo t where f.intFtbOid = #intFtbOid# and UPPER(t.vcFactTableName) = UPPER(substr(f.vcTableName,0,length(t.vcFactTableName))) and f.chIndexComplete = '1' and isnull(f.chTaskCreated,'2') = '2' and t.chFlag = '0' and t.chGranularity = '1' and UPPER(t.vcFactTableName) in ('FTBASSISTRULEDATA','FTBMAINRULEFLUSHDATA','FTBASSISTVETORRECOGNISEDATA')
select count(*) as num from ( select 1 as num from tbFactTableOperation f,tbTaskInfo t where f.intFtbOid = #intFtbOid# and UPPER(t.vcFactTableName) = UPPER(substr(f.vcTableName,0,length(t.vcFactTableName))) and f.chIndexComplete = '1' and isnull(f.chTaskCreated,'2') = '2' and t.chFlag = '0' and t.chGranularity = '0' union all select 1 from tbFactTableOperation f,tbTaskInfo t where f.intFtbOid = #intFtbOid# and UPPER(t.vcFactTableName) = UPPER(substr(f.vcTableName,0,length(t.vcFactTableName))) and f.chIndexComplete = '1' and isnull(f.chTaskCreated,'2') = '2' and t.chFlag = '0' and t.chGranularity = '1' and UPPER(t.vcFactTableName) in ('FTBASSISTRULEDATA','FTBMAINRULEFLUSHDATA','FTBASSISTVETORRECOGNISEDATA') ) as t
sqlMap.select: select t.intTaskId,t.intTaskInfoId,t.vcTaskName,t.dtStatTime,t.chGranularity,t.intTaskPriority, t.intTaskState,t.dtCompleteTime,t.vcFactTableName,t.intFtbOid,vcSqlId from tbTask t,tbTaskInfo i where t.intTaskState = 0 and t.intTaskInfoId = i.intTaskInfoId order by t.chGranularity,t.dtStatTime,t.intTaskPriority,t.intTaskId --order by t.dtStatTime,t.chGranularity,t.intTaskPriority,t.intTaskId -- order by t.intTaskPriority,t.dtStatTime,t.intTaskId,t.chGranularity desc --order by t.dtStatTime desc,t.intTaskPriority,t.intTaskId,t.chGranularity desc
sqlMap.update: update tbFactTableOperation set chtaskcreated = '1',IntTaskNum = #intTaskNum#,dtTaskCreateTime = #dtTaskCreateTime# where intFtbOid = #intFtbOid#
update tbTask set intTaskState = #intTaskState# where intTaskId = #intTaskId#
update tbTask set intTaskState = 0 where intTaskId in ( $intTaskIds$ )
sqlMap.select: select intTaskId,intTaskInfoId,vcTaskName,vcFactTableName,dtStatTime,chGranularity,intTaskPriority,intTaskState,dtCompleteTime,intFtbOid* from tbTask where intTaskId in ($intTaskIds$)
sqlMap.update: update tbFactTableOperation set intTaskCompleteNum = isnull(intTaskCompleteNum,0)+1, dtTaskCompleteTime = #dtCompleteTime#, chTaskComplete = (case when isnull(intTaskCompleteNum,0)+1 = intTaskNum then '1' else '0' end) where intFtbOid = #intFtbOid#
sqlMap.insert: insert into tbtask (inttaskinfoid,vctaskname,dtstattime,chgranularity,inttaskpriority,inttaskstate,dtcompletetime,vcfacttablename,intFtbOid) select t.inttaskinfoid,t.vctaskname,convert(datetime,dateformat(days(getdate(),-1),'yyyy-mm-dd')+' 00:00:00'), t.chgranularity,t.inttaskpriority,0,null,trim(vcFactTableName)+'_'+dateformat(days(getdate(),-1),'yyyymmdd'),0 from tbtaskinfo t where t.chFlag = '0' and t.chGranularity = '1' and ( select count(1) from tbtasklog d where d.chgranularity='0' and dateformat(d.dtstattime,'yyyy-mm-dd') = dateformat(days(getdate(),-1),'yyyy-mm-dd') and UPPER('ftbGnAppData') = UPPER(substr(d.vcfacttablename,0,length('ftbGnAppData'))) ) > 0 and not exists ( select 1 from tbtasklog d where d.chgranularity='1' and dateformat(d.dtstattime,'yyyy-mm-dd') = dateformat(days(getdate(),-1),'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.inttaskinfoid = d.inttaskinfoid ) and not exists ( select 1 from tbtask d where d.chgranularity='1' and dateformat(d.dtstattime,'yyyy-mm-dd') = dateformat(days(getdate(),-1),'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.inttaskinfoid = d.inttaskinfoid ) and UPPER(t.vcfacttablename) not in ('FTBASSISTRULEDATA','FTBMAINRULEFLUSHDATA','FTBASSISTVETORRECOGNISEDATA','FTBBLACKBERRY') union select t.inttaskinfoid,t.vctaskname,convert(datetime,dateformat(days(getdate(),-1),'yyyy-mm-dd')+' 00:00:00'),t.chgranularity, t.inttaskpriority,0,null,trim(vcFactTableName)+'_'+dateformat(days(getdate(),-1),'yyyymmdd'),0 from tbtaskinfo t where t.chFlag = '0' and t.chGranularity = '1' and not exists ( select 1 from tbtasklog d where d.chgranularity='1' and dateformat(d.dtstattime,'yyyy-mm-dd') = dateformat(days(getdate(),-1),'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.inttaskinfoid = d.inttaskinfoid ) and not exists ( select 1 from tbtask d where d.chgranularity='1' and dateformat(d.dtstattime,'yyyy-mm-dd') = dateformat(days(getdate(),-1),'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.inttaskinfoid = d.inttaskinfoid ) and UPPER(t.vcfacttablename) in ('FTBBLACKBERRY')

insert into tbtask ( inttaskinfoid,vctaskname,dtstattime,chgranularity,inttaskpriority,inttaskstate,dtcompletetime,vcfacttablename,intFtbOid) select t.inttaskinfoid,t.vctaskname,convert(datetime,dateformat(days(getdate(),-6),'yyyy-mm-dd')+' 00:00:00'), t.chgranularity,t.inttaskpriority,0,null,vcFactTableName,0 from tbtaskinfo t where t.chFlag = '0' and t.chGranularity = '2'

insert into tbtask ( inttaskinfoid,vctaskname,dtstattime,chgranularity,inttaskpriority,inttaskstate,dtcompletetime,vcfacttablename,intFtbOid ) select t.inttaskinfoid,t.vctaskname,convert(datetime,dateformat(days(getdate(),-20),'yyyy-mm-dd')+' 00:00:00'), t.chgranularity,t.inttaskpriority,0,null,vcFactTableName,0 from tbtaskinfo t where t.chFlag = '0' and t.chGranularity = '3'

insert into tbtask (inttaskinfoid,vctaskname,dtstattime,chgranularity,inttaskpriority,inttaskstate,dtcompletetime,vcfacttablename,intFtbOid) select t.inttaskinfoid,t.vctaskname,convert(datetime,dateformat(days(getdate(),-1),'yyyy-mm-dd')+' 00:00:00'), t.chgranularity,t.inttaskpriority,0,null,trim(t.vcFactTableName)+'_'+dateformat(days(getdate(),-1),'yyyymmdd'),0 from tbtaskinfo t where t.chFlag = '0' and t.chGranularity = '1' and datepart(hh,getdate()) >= 7 and dateformat(days(getdate(),-1),'yyyy-mm-dd') >'2010-03-30' and ( select count(1) from tbtasklog d where d.chgranularity='0' and dateformat(d.dtstattime,'yyyy-mm-dd') = dateformat(days(getdate(),-1),'yyyy-mm-dd') and UPPER('ftbGnAppData') = UPPER(substr(d.vcfacttablename,0,length('ftbGnAppData')))) > 0 and not exists ( select 1 from tbtasklog d where d.chgranularity='1' and dateformat(d.dtstattime,'yyyy-mm-dd') = dateformat(days(getdate(),-1),'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.inttaskinfoid = d.inttaskinfoid ) and not exists ( select 1 from tbtask d where d.chgranularity='1' and dateformat(d.dtstattime,'yyyy-mm-dd') = dateformat(days(getdate(),-1),'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.inttaskinfoid = d.inttaskinfoid ) and UPPER(t.vcfacttablename) not in ('FTBASSISTRULEDATA','FTBMAINRULEFLUSHDATA','FTBASSISTVETORRECOGNISEDATA','FTBBLACKBERRY') union select t.inttaskinfoid,t.vctaskname,convert(datetime,dateformat(days(getdate(),-1),'yyyy-mm-dd')+' 00:00:00'), t.chgranularity,t.inttaskpriority,0,null,trim(vcFactTableName)+'_'+dateformat(days(getdate(),-1),'yyyymmdd'),0 from tbtaskinfo t where t.chFlag = '0' and t.chGranularity = '1' and datepart(hh,getdate()) >= 7 and not exists ( select 1 from tbtasklog d where d.chgranularity='1' and dateformat(d.dtstattime,'yyyy-mm-dd') = dateformat(days(getdate(),-1),'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.inttaskinfoid = d.inttaskinfoid ) and not exists ( select 1 from tbtask d where d.chgranularity='1' and dateformat(d.dtstattime,'yyyy-mm-dd') = dateformat(days(getdate(),-1),'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.inttaskinfoid = d.inttaskinfoid ) and UPPER(t.vcfacttablename) in ('FTBBLACKBERRY')

insert into tbtask (inttaskinfoid,vctaskname,dtstattime,chgranularity,inttaskpriority,inttaskstate,dtcompletetime,vcfacttablename,intFtbOid) select t.inttaskinfoid,t.vctaskname,convert(datetime,dateformat(weeks(getdate(),-1),'yyyy-mm-dd')+' 00:00:00'), t.chgranularity,t.inttaskpriority,0,null,vcFactTableName,0 from tbtaskinfo t where t.chFlag = '0' and t.chGranularity = '2' and datepart(hh,getdate()) >= 7 and datepart(dw,getdate()) >= 2 and datepart(dw,getdate()) <= 5 and dateformat(days(getdate(),-1),'yyyy-mm-dd') >='2010-03-21' and not exists ( select 1 from tbtasklog d where d.chgranularity='2' and datepart(wk,d.dtstattime) = datepart(wk,weeks(getdate(),-1)) and datepart(yy,d.dtstattime) = datepart(yy,weeks(getdate(),-1)) and t.inttaskinfoid = d.inttaskinfoid ) and not exists ( select 1 from tbtask d where d.chgranularity='2' and datepart(wk,d.dtstattime) = datepart(wk,weeks(getdate(),-1)) and datepart(yy,d.dtstattime) = datepart(yy,weeks(getdate(),-1)) and t.inttaskinfoid = d.inttaskinfoid )

insert into tbtask (inttaskinfoid,vctaskname,dtstattime,chgranularity,inttaskpriority,inttaskstate,dtcompletetime,vcfacttablename,intFtbOid) select t.inttaskinfoid,t.vctaskname,convert(datetime,dateformat(MONTHS(getdate(),-1),'yyyy-mm-dd')+' 00:00:00'), t.chgranularity,t.inttaskpriority,0,null,vcFactTableName,0 from tbtaskinfo t where t.chFlag = '0' and t.chGranularity = '3' and datepart(hh,getdate()) >= 7 and datepart(dd,getdate()) >= 2 and dateformat(days(getdate(),-1),'yyyy-mm-dd') >='2010-04-02' and not exists ( select 1 from tbtasklog d where d.chgranularity='3' and datepart(mm,d.dtstattime) = datepart(mm,MONTHS(getdate(),-1)) and datepart(yy,d.dtstattime) = datepart(yy,MONTHS(getdate(),-1)) and t.inttaskinfoid = d.inttaskinfoid ) and not exists ( select 1 from tbtask d where d.chgranularity='3' and datepart(mm,d.dtstattime) = datepart(mm,MONTHS(getdate(),-1)) and datepart(yy,d.dtstattime) = datepart(yy,MONTHS(getdate(),-1)) and t.inttaskinfoid = d.inttaskinfoid )
